title: Conscious Relationship
subtitle: Love as a path of growth
description: Move beyond unconscious patterns into intentional partnership. This course covers how to use relationship as a vehicle for growth, navigate conflict consciously, maintain polarity and passion, and build something that lasts.

modules.title: How We Relate Unconsciously
modules.description: Patterns, projections, and what we bring to partnership

modules.title: Rupture and Repair
modules.description: How to come back from disconnection

modules.title: Growing Together
modules.description: Evolving as individuals and as partners

modules.title: Building Lasting Love
modules.description: What makes relationships endure and deepen

whatYouLearn: Use relationship triggers as opportunities for growth
Understand and work with polarity dynamics
requirements: Currently in a relationship or preparing for one
Willingness to examine your patterns honestly
Attachment Repair course helpful but not required

questions.question: What does 'unconscious relating' refer to?
options: Patterns from the past running your relationship without awareness

questions.question: How can relationship serve as a growth path?
options: Triggers and challenges reveal what needs healing in yourself
You become more like your partner

questions.question: What makes conflict 'conscious' rather than destructive?
options: Staying curious about underlying needs, taking breaks when flooded, repairing after

questions.question: What is 'polarity' in relationship context?
options: The attractive tension between different energies (often masculine/feminine)
Living at opposite ends of the house

questions.question: What does healthy 'repair' after rupture involve?
options: Acknowledging hurt, taking responsibility, and reconnecting intentionally

questions.question: How do you balance individual growth with partnership?
options: Support each other's growth while maintaining connection and shared direction
One person grows, the other supports

questions.question: What contributes most to lasting love?
options: Consistent repair, continued choosing each other, and growing together
